column4: what do i add to fstab  if i want to get this effect sudo mount /dev/sda2 /media/C
mount /dev/sda2 filesystem /media/C default 0 2 (2 - means boot order)
mount /dev/sda2 /media/C default filesystem 0 2 (2 - means boot order)
mount /dev/sda2 /media/C filesystem default 0 2 (2 - means boot order) da
